value.name: Kyle Hart aims to ‘keep those bullpen guys bored’ and log quality starts (WooSox notebook)
value.description: When he’s on the mound, Worcester starter Kyle Hart aims to keep it that way for as long as he can. “My goal almost every outing is how long can I keep those bullpen guys bored,” Hart said after earning his first victory of the season in the WooSox’ 4-1 win Thursday night.

value.name: Wife of man killed by Redwood City police files wrongful death lawsuit
value.description: According to police, officers responded to a home in the 400 block of Lincoln Avenue in Redwood City on Dec. 20, 2018, and encountered Kyle Hart in the home's backyard armed with a butcher knife.
